title: BT SW Developer Engineer in Test
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just build products — they craft the kind of wonder that’s revolutionised entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it. You will work on development of automation for testing new and proprietary wireless protocols. You will join a dynamic team responsible for qualifying the latest company products, having a direct influence on the product quality and user experience all over the world.
description: In this role you will be responsible for design, development and executing test programs for embedded firmware and entire system. You will be responsible to investigate and debug failures and performance degradation. Ability of excellent problem solving, extreme creativity, high scripting skills and good understanding of embedded systems is required.
key_qualifications:
At least 2 year of firmware testing or system testing experience
At least 2 years of experience in python or any other scripting language is a must
Experience with data communication or wireless protocols.
Understanding linux / OS X or other unix-based operation systems
Knowledge in low level and high-level wireless protocols (bluetooth, LE, LTE, WLAN, etc.) - advantage
Familiar with audio and voice quality measurements technique- advantage
Experience in automation development- advantage
education_experience: B.Sc. in Electrical or Computer Engineering or Computer Science or equivalent
